fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Access Now Europe is actively involved in several EU legislative proposal impacting digital rights of users in Europe, including: 
- Telecoms Single Market 
- Export Control 
- Cybersecurity 
- AI 
- ePrivacy reform 
- Encryption 
- Data economy 
- International Data Transfers 
- General Data Protection Regulation 
- Legislation on Data Retention 
- EP Resolution on Mass surveillance 
- EU Passenger Name Records Directive 
- EP own initiative reports 
- Digital Single Market
source: European Commission, Service contract NO JUST/2015/RPPI/PR/RIGH/0218
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Multistakeholder expert group to support the application of Regulation (EU) 2016/679#E03537#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3537#Member#C
membership: Access Now Europe is a member of European Digital Rights (EDRi).
goals__remit: Access Now defends and extends the digital rights of users at risk around the world. By combining innovative policy, user engagement, and direct technical support, we fight for open and secure communications for all.
